title: Android 13 might bring Fast Pair support to devices from more OEMs
content:
At its annual I/O developer conference last year, Google announced plans to extend Fast Pair support to more devices. The company shed some light on this matter at CES last month and confirmed that it would soon extend Fast Pair support to Chromebooks, Android TVs, and Matter-enabled devices. But that doesn’t seem to be the

The post Android 13 might bring Fast Pair support to devices from more OEMs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is reportedly planning to make Fast Pair more open to OEMs with Android 13, thanks to a new mainline module. Read on to learn more.
